column2: CorePoint Lodging, Inc. operates as a real estate investment trust. The company is headquartered in Irving, Texas and currently employs 33 full-time employees. The firm is focused on select-service midscale and upper-midscale lodging. The firm owns a geographically diverse portfolio of 316 hotels and more than 40,000 rooms across 41 states. Its hotels are located primarily in or near employment centers, airports and other travel thoroughfares. The firm's main focus is on the mid-tier, select service space, because hotel developers are migrating to this tier, attracted by the strong cash-on-cash returns available from mid-tier hotels.
